Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • serviceApi.Session
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceAPI

    public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceAPI
    Author:
    lmrodrigues

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Session()
      Create a new session to a non logged user, to log in on system, the user needs to execute the login method of this class.
